function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of unified guidelines for sports facilities and practices","Impact":"Increased risk of inconsistent or ineffective measures for controlling disease transmission","Mitigation":"Developing a comprehensive and unified set of guidelines for sports facilities and practices","Technologies":"Digital platforms for knowledge sharing and collaboration","People":"Athletes, players, sports facility staff, and visitors","Owner":"Sports associations, governing bodies, health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate enforcement of social distancing regulations in sports facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to close contact","Mitigation":"Strict monitoring and enforcement of social distancing regulations, public awareness campaigns on the importance of social distancing","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, contact tracing apps, communication platforms for public awareness","People":"Sports facility staff, visitors, athletes, players","Owner":"Sports facility management, health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Insufficient disinfection and monitoring of swimming pool facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through contaminated water","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of swimming pool water, monitoring of chlorine levels, adherence to disinfection procedures, and monitoring of swimmers' distances","Technologies":"Automated disinfection systems, water testing kits, monitoring sensors","People":"Swimmers, facility staff, visitors","Owner":"Swimming pool management, health organizations, government authorities"}]}
